testcase.name: Login Functionalaity
testcase.system-out: Given User have the valid credential and application is up..................passed When User login to the application with Valid Credentials...................passed Then login should be successful "My account - My Store"....................passed

testcase.name: Order Tshirt - Opening the Tshirt page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on My Account My store page...................................passed When User click on TShirt Tab...............................................passed Then User should land on "T-SHIRTS" shopping Page...........................passed And User should see the Tshirts in my TShirt shopping page..................passed

testcase.name: Order Tshirt - Adding a TShirt to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on a TShirt shopping Page.....................................passed When User sort the TShirt "In stock"........................................passed And User open the required TShirt "Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts".............passed And User select the Quanity/Size/Colour "Blue","S","2"......................passed And User click on add to card button........................................passed Then User should see the selected TShirt in the add to cart confirmation page with "Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts","Blue","S","2".passed And User shoud see the message "Product successfully added to your shopping cart".passed

testcase.name: Order Tshirt -Check out the selected TShirt to the shopping cart summary
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the "SHOPPING-CART SUMMARY" page...........................passed Then User should see the selected TShirt in the shopping cart summary page with "Faded Short Sleeve T-shirts","2","S","Blue".passed

testcase.name: Order Tshirt -Check out the selected product to the Address to update the address
testcase.system-out: Given User is on "ADDRESSES" page...........................................passed When User click on delivery address update button...........................passed And User update the address Fields with "pallikaranai"......................passed And User clicks on save button..............................................passed Then User should see the updated address in the delivery item box "pallikaranai".passed

testcase.name: Order Tshirt -Check out the selected product to the shipping
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the shipping page with title "SHIPPING"....................passed Then User should able to select the Terms of service "1"....................passed

testcase.name: Update Personal Information
testcase.system-out: Given User login to the application with Valid Credentials..................passed When User click on my personal info link....................................passed And User Update FirstName "Vasanthi" and CurrentPassword....................passed And User click on Save button...............................................passed Then User should see the update confirmation message "Your personal information has been successfully updated.".passed
